name: Pocket Family GB2
overview: The second family development simulation in which the player takes care of the family who moved in as a landlord. This time, the number of owners has increased from one to four, and it has become possible to visit the house with a lopo. You can get items in the mini game "Walking in the back mountains", and you can enjoy various things such as equipping the lopo parts with lopo parts and planting flower seeds in the flowerbed. Five types of mini-games that improve the abilities of the family and four types of care games that improve the intimacy with the family have been created. The number of characters appearing this time has increased to about 300 types for album creation. Take care of many characters and fill the album.
